Class ResourceAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.reorganize.ResourceAction

extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to manage 'ResourceAction' entities through Drools rules engine

      • findOrgUnitByResource

        public static <any> findOrgUnitByResource(DAO sql,
                                          OrgUnitBean ouBean,
                                          ResourceBean resourceBean,
                                          Paging paging)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the organizational units that have the resource given assigned.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        ouBean - organization unit filter
        resourceBean - resource filter, mandatory
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of organization units found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findUserByResource

        public static BeanList findUserByResource(DAO sql,
                                          boolean hierarchy,
                                          boolean delegated,
                                          UserBean userBean,
                                          OrgUnitBean ouBean,
                                          EntitlementBean entitlementBean,
                                          AbstractBean resourceBean,
                                          Paging paging)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the users that have the resource given. It is possible to filter by user, organizational unit and entitlement. When used, the entitlement filter must be defined uniquely. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the organization unit filter must include its hierarchy of children or not. The delegated boolean flag is used to specify if the search must refer to the users that have the entitlement in delegation or not.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the organization unit filter must include its hierarchy of children or not
        delegated - boolean flag used to specify if the search must refer to the users that have the entitlement in delegation or not
        userBean - user filter
        ouBean - organization unit filter
        entitlementBean - entitlement filter, if used it must be defined uniquely
        resourceBean - resource filter, mandatory
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of users found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findUserByIntOU

        public static BeanList findUserByIntOU(DAO sql,
                                       boolean hierarchy,
                                       boolean delegated,
                                       UserBean userBean,
                                       OrgUnitBean ouBean,
                                       EntitlementBean entitlementBean,
                                       OrgUnitBean orgResourceBean,
                                       Paging paging)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the users that have the organization unit orgResourceBean as an internal resource. It is possible to filter by user, organizational unit and entitlement. When used, the entitlement filter must be defined uniquely. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the organization unit filter must include its hierarchy of children or not. The delegated boolean flag is used to specify if the search must refer to the users that have the entitlement in delegation or not.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the organization unit filter must include its hierarchy of children or not
        delegated - boolean flag used to specify if the search must refer to the users that have the entitlement in delegation or not
        userBean - user filter
        ouBean - organization unit filter
        entitlementBean - entitlement filter, if used it must be defined uniquely
        orgResourceBean - organization unit resource filter, mandatory
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of users found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findUserByPermission

        public static <any> findUserByPermission(DAO sql,
                                         boolean hierarchy,
                                         boolean delegated,
                                         UserBean userBean,
                                         OrgUnitBean ouBean,
                                         <any> blEntitlements,
                                         AbstractBean resourceBean,
                                         Paging paging)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the users that have the resource given and at least one of the permissions given. It is possible to filter by user and organizational unit. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the organization unit filter must include its hierarchy of children or not. The delegated boolean flag is used to specify if the search must refer to the users that have the permissions in delegation or not.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the organization unit filter must include its hierarchy of children or not
        delegated - boolean flag used to specify if the search must refer to the users that have the permissions in delegation or not
        userBean - user filter
        ouBean - organization unit filter
        blEntitlements - list of permissions filter, mandatory, each defined uniquely and all considered in OR condition
        resourceBean - resource filter, mandatory
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of users found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findUserByIntOUAndPermission

        public static <any> findUserByIntOUAndPermission(DAO sql,
                                                 boolean hierarchy,
                                                 boolean delegated,
                                                 UserBean userBean,
                                                 OrgUnitBean ouBean,
                                                 <any> blEntitlements,
                                                 OrgUnitBean orgResourceBean,
                                                 Paging paging)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the users that have the resource given and at least one of the permissions given. It is possible to filter by user and organizational unit. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the organization unit filter must include its hierarchy of children or not. The delegated boolean flag is used to specify if the search must refer to the users that have the permissions in delegation or not.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the organization unit filter must include its hierarchy of children or not
        delegated - boolean flag used to specify if the search must refer to the users that have the permissions in delegation or not
        userBean - user filter
        ouBean - organization unit filter
        blEntitlements - list of permissions filter, mandatory, each defined uniquely and all considered in OR condition
        orgResourceBean - organization unit resource filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of users found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
